title: Simulation Game-Based Education on Hand Hygiene for Medical Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Medical Hygiene Concepts and Infection Control Principles
context.additional_context: Motivational design for game-averse learners, utilizing personal device-based online simulation environments

learning_goals: Learners achieve over 95% accuracy in hand disinfection procedures within the simulation game.
Learners perform appropriate hand hygiene protocols three consecutive times in crisis scenarios resembling real clinical settings.
Learners submit an action plan developed within 72 hours after completing the game to demonstrate compliance commitment.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
